lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In bond portfolios, the money managers generally showed a preference for shorter term (10 years and under) Treasury notes and, to a lesser extent, agency securities, rather than longer-dated Treasury issues and corporate bonds.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "In the near term, the stock market has more prospects for growth, due to the mixed signals on the economy so far, the slim chance the Federal Reserve will ease policy and still heavy debt accumulation," Collins said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Lisec-Tinto, who formulated Merrill's latest asset mix recommendations with new chief investment strategist Charles Clough, said there may be some consolidation of recent stock price gains, but the market appears to have good potential.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In bond portfolios, the money managers generally showed a preference for shorter term (10 years and under) Treasury notes and, to a lesser extent, agency securities, rather than longer-dated Treasury issues and corporate bonds.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "In the near term, the stock market has more prospects for growth, due to the mixed signals on the economy so far, the slim chance the Federal Reserve will ease policy and still heavy debt accumulation," Collins said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Lisec-Tinto, who formulated Merrill's latest asset mix recommendations with new chief investment strategist Charles Clough, said there may be some consolidation of recent stock price gains, but the market appears to have good potential.
